title: SelectorAgent Input Contract
description: Input requirements for the Selector Agent

target_url.description: Base URL of the site to analyze (listing page URL)

pagination_max_pages.description: Maximum number of pagination pages (from Discovery Agent)

pagination_links.description: Sample pagination URLs visited by Discovery Agent (used for URL pattern detection)

article_urls.description: Pre-discovered article URLs from Discovery Agent (optional, agent can discover its own)

content_availability.description: Content fields discovered by Discovery Agent (guides which selectors to find)
